channel.title: Planet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the planet of the day.

item.title: List of nearest terrestrial exoplanet candidates
item.description: This list of nearest terrestrial exoplanet candidates contains possible terrestrial ("rocky") exoplanets spaced at a distance of up to 50 light-years from the Solar System, ordered by increasing distance. They may be composed primarily of silicate rocks and/or metals. Within the Solar System, the terrestrial planets are the inner planets closest to the Sun.
